value:
$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|This is just a guess, but I think Lyn
might be sensitive to the fact that her
upbringing is different from ours.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Huh? But all I said was that I don't
like to hit the books either, right?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|Yes, but you're taking books for
granted. As the children of nobility,
we're guaranteed opportunities.$k$pThere are many people in the world
who may want to study, but don't
have the opportunity or means to.$k$pThere are even those who don't see
the point in studying at all...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Ah, I get it...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|I don't mean that Lyn didn't receive
a good education. It's just, there's
something my father always says...$k$p"Never take what you have for
granted." We shouldn't assume
everyone has what we do.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Gah. I really blew it, huh? That's no
way for the right-hand man of Ostia's
future marquess to act...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|So, uh... What do you think it'll take
for her to forgive me?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|That's a good question. Let's think of
a solution together.$k$p$Sbs150|
